page.title: 01THE HORNCHURCH AREA -
page.content: A QUESTIONAIRE BY ANDREW DELLBRIDGE Q. What is your opinion of the area? A. I like the area as its on the border of the Greater London Area and is close to the coast and countryside. It is also a pleasant place to live. Q. How long have you lived in the area? A. Three years. Q. Why did you move here? A. I moved from Romford because I wanted a new house, I liked the look of Hornchurch and it has an underground station. Q. Has the area changed in any way and if so how? A. There are many new housing estates being built. Q. Do you use the local shops more than the big supermarkets? A. No we use the big supermarket mainly.
